name: Aliroc
description: A pixel art jumper that is original in its graphics and mechanics, the story of the game is that an army of mutants flew to planet earth and monsters killed all the animals except the king of the world and his cats because they wanted to interrogate them but they didn't know the animals on planet earth and that's why they took a cat for interrogation the king was locked in and it was dry but the king managed to free himself and run away and at this moment our game begins in a crazy journey through portals to the commander of all monsters can he defeat her?
